New Records: Scotland secured their first T20I victory over Namibia.
Richie Berrington hit a six to seal the win for Scotland.
Michael Leask contributed 35 runs off 17 balls.
Key Match Events: Scotland overcame early wickets to chase down the target.
Richie Berrington's crucial performance in the chase.
A dramatic stumping moment involving Zane Green and Brandon McMullen.
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland's strong bowling performance early in the innings.
Namibia's batting efforts led by Gerhard Erasmus.
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland moved to the top of Group B after the win.
Namibia's performance and their next match against Oman.
